thread.title: 21 tracks where Tony Stewart has won NASCAR Cup Series races

title: 21 tracks where Tony Stewart has won NASCAR Cup Series races

organizations.name: getty images getty images for nascar auto club speedway

text:
21 tracks where Tony Stewart has won NASCAR Cup Series races Chase Wilhelm Jan 1, 2017 at 6:24p ET 0Shares 
In 18 full-time Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series season, Tony Stewart earned victories on 21 of the 23 tracks on the current circuit. 
Thirty-three of Stewart's 49 career wins came while driving the No. 20 for Joe Gibbs Racing. After leaving JGR to start Stewart-Haas Racing, he scored his final 16 victories in the No. 14. 
Here’s a full breakdown of where the three-time champion graced Victory Lane: Getty Images Getty Images
